name: MIDA Multi-Tool
flavor_text: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description: Radar stays active while aiming down sights.
perks.name: MIDA Radar

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
